node.display_long_description:
"加入 Epic Roller Coasters ，乘坐过山车在特色场景和环境飞速穿行，感受异于生活的刺激冒险！

游戏共推出四种模式：
- 单人模式：家人、好友和您各自驾驶一辆过山车。
- 多人模式：模拟现实场景，众人同坐一趟过山车。您可以选择与好友，或是与来自世界各地的玩家们同乘一趟过山车，自拍精彩画面，并在在冒险结束后发布分享，留作纪念。
- 竞速模式：自定义过山车驾驶时间，或是向好友发起挑战，勇夺极速桂冠！
- 射击模式：完美融合两大神奇世界！同时享受酣畅淋漓的过山车活动和射击游戏！启动慢动作功能，通过完全截然不同的游戏视角观察环境，快速瞄准目标，打破射击成绩！

每趟旅程均将为您提供专属过山车和武器，让你选择最适合的装备和武器挑战不同冒险，提升排行榜名次！"

node.display_short_description: The Premium Bundle allows you to unlock ALL the roller coasters in the game, plus new cars and new weapons. All game modes are included.

purchase_alerts.message: 这是附加内容，需要有主游戏 (疯狂过山车) 才能玩

nodes.title: Before x After: Lost Forest
nodes.body_text:
Hello everyone,

Lost Forest remaster is ready for use on Oculus Store. See what has changed:

- New 3D models;
- The tracks have been completely remade into a smoother and realistic path leaving physics to act in a more precise and comfortable way;
- Ambient light now has more nuances with shadows;
- More realistic sky with clouds and a sunset; and
- Much more appropriate fog color and density, creating a more immersive atmosphere.
 
Our team is still working on new events as well.
 
We hope you have a great experience and don't forget to rate us in the store

If you have any questions or suggestions please let us know using our channels: Discord, Facebook Group or email

Don't forget to also check our social media for more updates. We're @b4t.games on Facebook and Instagram.

Available now on Quest 1, Quest 2 and Rift S.

Kind regards,
B4Team.

nodes.title: North Pole Remaster
nodes.body_text:
Hello everybody,

It's Xmas time and we just did a lot of improvements on the North Pole ride!
Maybe you'll miss the Santa Claus with you in the sleigh cart but that's because now he's working to distribute the presents on the ride!

The track is much smoother to give you and your whole family more comfort during the ride! And the level details have been increased in quantity and quality.

We hope you have a great experience and don't forget to rate us in the store

If you have any question or suggestion please let us know using our channels:
Discord: https://discord.gg/SrjFhJB
Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/998863630630292/
E-mail: dev@b4t.games

It's already available on Quest 1, Quest 2 and Rift S.

Don't forget to also check our social media for more updates. We're @b4t.games on Facebook and Instagram.

Kind regards,
B4Team.

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription: So I watched the previews of the game many times over, it showed me a Halloween coaster, a zombie coaster, snow coaster a dinosaur and many more,  so I was so exited to buy this game, I forget the price but it was about 15-20 dollars US,  thought that was pretty fair,  so I purchased the game and now realize that you don’t get 90% of the preview coasters but you get to see I uik m 3!!! That’s right 3 out of 18 coasters!!! Only after you buy the game for whatever price does it then tell you that it’s about $4.00 each additional coaster or $14.00 for 18 coasters pack, but that’s not a lie as well because they have 18 total and because  you already spent the $15-$20  dollars to buy the game you already own 3 of them which was the first rip off, now they want to sell you another so called 18 that you thought you already paid for although it seems you paid for 3 only 3,,, just be honest, I know lieng to people gets more sales but it pisses people off more to and I’ll tell as many as I can when pissed and only a few when happy so you need more happy people than pissed off people, I learned that over 20yrs ago in business.  Point is just tell people up front that the whole gale is about $30.00 and honestly I still would have bought it cause it really is that good! but 3 coasters for $15 and the other 15 coasters for another $15 once you own the game and realize they lied to you and  only gave you 3 coasters has got to be one of the shiestiest  things I’ve seen yet!!!! I’m not happy and on principle alone I will be delete if the game and would never give you the satisfaction of making me think I got all for $15 then give me only 3 then get me for another $15 for 18 coasters which is another lie cause I own 3 and there’s only 18 total, so all lies and I would not recommend buying a game from these types of people,  won’t see another cent of my money!!!!! Do not buy this game!!!!!! Anyone!!!!!
node.reviewTitle: They rip u off, read before purchasing !

developerResponse.body: Hey, how are you doing? You can buy the pack (all the roller coasters will be unlocked) for $12.99 USD or you can buy each one individually for $2.99 USD each. So, if that is not the trasaction that you made, please, get in contact with us and we'll be happy to help you. Contact on: fb.me/b4t.games or sales@b4t.games

website_page_meta.description:
"加入 Epic Roller Coasters ，乘坐过山车在特色场景和环境飞速穿行，感受异于生活的刺激冒险！
四大模式等你挑战：单人模式、多人模式、竞速模式和射击模式。

在每趟旅程中，您将有机会进入奇异世界探奇，使用各种过山车和武器应对挑战，感受非同凡响的冒险！

本游戏所有挑战适用各个水平的玩家体验。与家人和好友一起展开历险，其乐融融。"
website_page_meta.title: 疯狂过山车 · Oculus Quest
